title: Eddie Hughes – 2021 Comments on Rough Sleeping
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Eddie Hughes, the Minister for Rough Sleeping, on 15 May 2021.
content:
Across the country, there are staff and volunteers working tirelessly to make a real difference to the lives of rough sleepers.
